Miscellaneous Highlights: Trae Young is in the mix to be picked for the 2025 NBA All-Star game
The 2025 NBA All-Star game is getting closer and closer
The All-Star Game starters are going to be revealed on January 23rd and then the rest of the reserves will be revealed one week later on the 30th
Others: Trae Young is averaging 22.5 PPG on 40% shooting from the field (56.4 True shooting percentage) and 34% from three, while also leading the league in assists per game (12.2) and assist percentage (46.3%)
The All-Star format is going to get a bit of a makeover this season
The four teams participating in the NBA All-Star Game will compete for a prize pool of $1.8 million
